Greetings to emir of Bahrain
    Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, today sent a message of greetings to Sheik Hamad Bin Isa al-Khalifa, emir of the state of Bahrain, on the occasion of its 40th national day.
 The message extended warm congratulations to the emir, the government and people of Bahrain on the occasion of its 40th national day.    
 Kim Yong Nam expressed belief that the friendly relations between the two countries established in the first year of the new century would develop on good terms in all domains in conformity with the desire and interests of the two peoples and wished him greater success in his work and good health and happiness.
